publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3502 Mr Jim Wallace: The Legal Aid (Scotland) Act 1986 Amendment Regulations 2002-That the Justice 1 Committee, in consideration of the draft Legal Aid (Scotland) Act 1986 Amendment Regulations 2002, recommends that the Regulations be approved. Supported by: Dr Richard Simpson*
